statement.p: Find a basis for the subspace W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{\left[\begin{array}{r} -3 \\ 3 \\ -3 \\ -2 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 0 \\ 1 \\ 2 \\ 0 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 6 \\ -5 \\ 8 \\ 4 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 2 \\ 1 \\ -2 \\ -2 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -18 \\ 13 \\ -28 \\ -12 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 0 \\ -10 \\ 10 \\ 10 \end{array}\right]\right\}. Be sure to explain why your result is a basis.
